Class CommandInterpreter

  • java.lang.Object
    • dungeonadventure.CommandInterpreter

  • public class CommandInterpreter
extends java.lang.Object
    Command interpreter. Used to prompt the user for input and validate it against given commands.
    Author:
    Mikko Piuhola
